title: KX Tech Club: How is technology redefining human connection?
description: In session 5 we delve into the connection between technology and human relationships, with digital creator Zeena Shah, The Self Space founder Jodie Cariss and a member of the Samsung KX team. This three-part series explores how technology has changed the way we connect with people and how products like the Galaxy Z Flip3 are helping bring people together.

components.copy: KX Tech Club: How is technology redefining human connection?

text: In session 5 we delve into the connection between technology and human relationships, with digital creator Zeena Shah, The Self Space founder Jodie Cariss and a member of the Samsung KX team. This three-part series explores how technology has changed the way we connect with people and how products like the Galaxy Z Flip3 are helping bring people together.

components.copy: Episode 1 – Is it OK to have an online social life?

text: In episode 1 the panel discuss the significance of online relationships, the role of technology in lockdown and how to connect with like-minded people who we’ve never met in real life.

components.copy: Episode 2 – How can I practice authenticity online?

text: In episode 2 our experts explore how they mindfully present themselves online, why transparency is important and how technology is pushing boundaries when it comes to internet personas.

components.copy: Episode 3 – How can tech help loneliness?

text: Episode 3 dives into how far technology can go to prevent loneliness, from connecting, sharing and escaping together online.
